pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[docspec]: https://github.com/NiklasRosenstein/docspec# docspec-pythonA parser based on `lib2to3` procuding [docspec][] data from Python source code.Example:```from docspec_python import parse_python_moduleimport docspec, sysdocspec.dump_module(parse_python_module(sys.stdin, print_function=False), sys.stdout)``````$ docspec-python -p docspec | docspec --dump-tree --multiple | headmodule __init__| data __author__| data __version__| data __all__| data _ClassProxy| data _mapper| class Location| | data filename| | data lineno| class Decoration```---
